title: Dualisms, Calvinisms, McGilChrist/JBP Convo and other Rando Questions  PVK Q/A: May 14, 2021
description:
Bridges of Meaning Q/A, Conversation

Time stamps:

0:03:25  Intro
0:05:50  Jesus, humour and joking about our sins 
0:21:05  Narrative and agency: Vervaeke vs Calvinism
0:30:00  Can PVK simplify Decartes’ Dualism explanation?
0:50:45  Is there an AA analogue to the meaning crisis?
1:06:25  How to pray with heart and soul?
1:10:20  What would PVK change about BoM conversations?
1:26:25  Biblical themes in vogue and faded away
1:33:45  What’s PVK’s most difficult part of his job?
1:35:50  Has PVK performed an exorcism?
1:39:00  How have PVK’s sermons changed over the years?
1:42:05  How would PVK spend a sabbatical?
1:48:20  Why did PVK shaved his beard?
1:49:25  Why animals suffer while they don’t have free will?
1:55:35  What’s PVK’s plan if soon the rapture would occur?
1:58:55  What’s the goal of creation according to Calvinists?
2:04:55  Why’s Jesus called “Lord and Savior," not tormentor?
2:05:55  Why is the Temple of Jerusalem a stumbling block?
2:15:20  Where can we find the book written by PVK’s father? 
2:16:40  How’s Freddie?
2:18:50  PVK the extrovert / End
